_header: True king that sits in throne
_description: Laurence Minot, Battle of Halidon Hill — 92 lines in 8-line stanzas (abababab)

BlCottGalEIX.First Lines:
Trew king þat sates in tronevnto þe I tell my
                    tale…
BlCottGalEIX.Last Lines:
…Ihesu for þi woundes fiuein ingland help vs to haue
                    pese
BlCottGalEIX.Note: Followed immediately by rubric couplet heading to 4796.
BlCottGalEIX.Attributed Title:
Lithes and I will tell ȝow tyll / þe bataile of halidon hyll
                    (rubric above first line, f. 52ra)
